SELECT * from books b,chapter c,author a,(SELECT MAX(chapter_sort) cs,chapter_book_id cbi from chapter ct GROUP BY ct.chapter_book_id) d
c.chapter_book_id = b.book_id and b.book_author_id = a.author_id and c.chapter_book_id = d.cbi and c.chapter_sort =d.cs
and b.book_type_id = #{bookTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and c.chapter_fee = 0
and c.chapter_fee > 0
and b.book_flag = '连载中'
and b.book_flag = '已完结'
and b.book_word between 0 and 30
and b.book_word between 30 and 50
and b.book_word between 50 and 100
and b.book_word>100
GROUP BY book_id

select * from books b,author a,chapter c,booktype bt WHERE b.book_author_id = a.author_id and b.book_id = c.chapter_book_id and b.book_type_id = bt.booktype_id AND b.book_id = #{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select * from books WHERE book_name like #{bookName}

select * from books b,author a,booktype bt,chapter c,(SELECT MAX(chapter_sort) cs,chapter_book_id from chapter GROUP BY chapter.chapter_book_id) d WHERE b.book_author_id = a.author_id AND b.book_type_id = bt.booktype_id and b.book_id = #{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and b.book_id = c.chapter_book_id and c.chapter_sort = d.cs and c.chapter_book_id=d.chapter_book_id
select * from books b,author a,booktype bt where b.book_author_id=a.author_id AND b.book_type_id = bt.booktype_id order by b.book_click desc
select * from books b,author a,booktype bt where b.book_author_id=a.author_id AND b.book_type_id = bt.booktype_id order by b.book_reward desc

select * from books b,author a,booktype bt,(SELECT COUNT(*) ct,b.book_id from books b,bookshelf bs WHERE b.book_id = bs.shelf_book_id GROUP BY b.book_id) co where b.book_author_id=a.author_id AND b.book_id = co.book_id and b.book_type_id = bt.booktype_id order by co.ct desc

select * from books b,author a,booktype bt,(SELECT COUNT(*) ct,b.book_id from books b,payrecord pr WHERE pr.payrecord_book_id = b.book_id and pr.payrecord_flag='购买'GROUP BY b.book_id) co where b.book_author_id=a.author_id AND b.book_id = co.book_id and b.book_type_id = bt.booktype_id order by co.ct desc
